extendedInfo.description: careâ¢ (Computer Aided Rehabilitative Education) is a progressive approach to patient education which provides health care institutions with innovative, customized multimedia solutions to transform traditional patient education into interactive web-based patient support tools. All information is secure and requires personal login details from your health care provider, which can also be used for accessing the information via the www.careforpatients.com website.

reviews.title: Easy access to content
reviews.comment: Lets me access content without having to visit the website and allows referring to videos anywhere. Cool!
reviews.author: Ramachandran S
